p: HPLC analysis was established on Agilent 1260 (Agilent Technologies, Torrance, CA, USA) using Diamonsil C18 column (150 mm × 4.6 mm, 5 μm) at the column temperature of 40 °C and the injection volume of 10 μL. The mobile phase composed of methanol and 0.1% phosphoric acid (40:60, v/ v) whereas the flow rate was at 1.0 mL/min. Spectra was recorded at 335 nm wavelength by UV detector to determine the SCU content.
